name: Little Women: Atlanta
overview: These new little ladies turn it up wherever they go, especially with club promoter Emily Fernandez leading the charge with identical twins, Andrea and Amanda Salinas, Bri Barlup, Ashley "Minnie" Ross and Tiffany "Monie" Cashette. The drama heats up with these friends as catfights erupt among their feisty personalities and power hierarchies. Like many friends, they deal with problems with their parents, fights over men and one little lady even has a baby on the way. When it comes down to it, this clique is not afraid to get into it with each other, but together they face the daily challenges that come with being a little person while proving they are the true queens of Atlanta.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In season one, the little ladies turn it up wherever they go — especially with club promoter Emily leading the charge. There is no shortage of drama within this circle of friends as they face the daily challenges that come with being a little person.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two dives deeper into relationships and rivalries among this group of “frenemies.” Temperatures rise in the South as the ladies must now face the consequences of their actions following a tumultuous season of fighting, betrayal and deceit. No one is immune from the drama.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season three returns with Ms. Juicy, Minnie, Monie, Amanda and Andrea, along with new little lady Tanya. As the girls struggle to navigate their relationships, new bonds are formed and old ties are broken. And even though some relationships may be damaged beyond repair, a shocking admission forces all of the girls to confront a new reality.

episodes.name: Twerk Off!
episodes.overview: The women set off for a night at a club, but things become heated after the twins clash with Bri and Emily.

episodes.name: Juicy Gossip
episodes.overview: Tensions increase between the twins and Cheeks. Emily decides to tell the group about the baby.

episodes.name: Tiny Twins Takeover
episodes.overview: Emily invites all the ladies to go horseback riding, causing Amanda and Andrea to doubt if she's actually pregnant. Elsewhere, Bri wants more from her relationship with Wooda, but she ends up looking for someone more willing to commit.

episodes.name: Birthday Blowout
episodes.overview: Andrea and Chris' relationship problems come to a head. Meanwhile, Bri invites Emily and Minnie into the wilderness for a "Relationship ReBootcamp"; and Minnie plans a birthday party, but an unexpected guest crashes her big night.

episodes.name: Bad Apples
episodes.overview: The ladies struggle with Monie's recent behavior; and Minnie reveals a secret when the group goes apple-picking. Later, tensions escalate between Emily and Bri and the twins when they find themselves in a turf war.

episodes.name: Mo Monie, Mo Problems
episodes.overview: Emily's pregnancy helps repair her relationship with her boyfriend; Bri faces a difficult choice when she tries to get closer to her baby's father; the girls threaten to walk off the set of a music video after the director makes insulting comments.

episodes.name: Savannah Showdown
episodes.overview: Emily books the ladies a gig and a vacation in Savannah; tensions run high between Minnie and Monie over the disastrous music video shoot.

episodes.name: Little Women Big Changes
episodes.overview: The man Minnie believes is her father agrees to a paternity test; Emily learns the sex and size of her baby; Amanda makes a choice that will impact her relationship with her twin sister Andrea forever.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Host Terra Jole sits down with the ladies of Little Women: Atlanta to revisit all the excitement and drama from this season. The girls answer tough questions about their relationships and things get serious when some surprise guests join them on stage.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In season one, the little ladies turn it up wherever they go — especially with club promoter Emily leading the charge. There is no shortage of drama within this circle of friends as they face the daily challenges that come with being a little person.

episodes.name: Little Babies, Big Lies
episodes.overview: In the second-season opener, a baby shower is planned for Minnie, but problems arise; and Emily and Lontel head to Dallas for their baby's arrival but Emily's unsure if Lontel's prepared for fatherhood

episodes.name: Tammie Turns Up
episodes.overview: Juicy and Monie form a united front against Minnie after her miscarriage story fails to convince them she was ever pregnant to begin with.

episodes.name: Beach Bound
episodes.overview: As the ladies hit the road to Myrtle Beach, Minnie prepares to confront Ms. Juicy over a recent discovery.

episodes.name: Booty and the Beach
episodes.overview: The ladies don't leave the drama at home on their trip to Myrtle Beach. Later, Ms. Juicy hosts an event at a male strip club; Amanda's furious when Melissa doesn't mind her business; and Andrea's rushed to the hospital with contractions.

episodes.name: Law and Disorder
episodes.overview: The ladies visit a local winery. Later, Juicy, Minnie and Tammie face off in court; Bri faces a major decision with Wooda; and Andrea learns more about her baby girl.

episodes.name: Counterfeit Monie
episodes.overview: Monie's brother and father visit, leading to disaster for Morlin. Later, the ladies go tubing down the Chattahoochee River; Minnie challenges Monie on her status as a little person; and Andrea and Amanda argue about Andrea's relationship with Chris.

episodes.name: Sister Act
episodes.overview: Minnie reaches out to her half sister in hopes of reconnecting with her estranged father. Later, Emily faces a difficult decision about her newborn son's health; and Monie's determined to prove she has dwarfism after her status as a little person is questioned.

episodes.name: Rock the Boat
episodes.overview: When Minnie decides to put herself back out there, her boss sets her up on an unexpected blind date. Juicy's friends Hope and Charity, another set of little twins, make a big splash when they invite all the girls to a boat party on Lake Lanier.

episodes.name: Unhappy Birthday
episodes.overview: Bri invites the girls to celebrate Meek's 3rd birthday, but when Juicy shows up with the new twins, Hope and Charity, tensions mount and Monie loses her cool. And when sudden contractions force Andrea to have an emergency C-section, Chris is nowhere to be found.

episodes.name: All the Juicy Details
episodes.overview: Juicy decides to take a huge step in her radio career by launching her own sex advice talk show.

episodes.name: Welcome Home Aubrey
episodes.overview: Minnie moves in with Andrea to help when baby Aubrey comes home; Juicy stirs up trouble; Bri and Wooda disagree about getting Meek involved in child modeling; Chris' sudden return to Atlanta comes as a shock to everyone but Andrea.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Andrea must make an agonizing decision regarding Minnie; Juicy attempts to rebuild her friendship with Minnie, but an argument breaks out at the Atlanta bridal expo.

episodes.name: Say Yes to the Mess
episodes.overview: Andrea must make an agonizing decision regarding Minnie; Juicy attempts to rebuild her friendship with Minnie, but an argument breaks out at the Atlanta bridal expo.

episodes.name: Little Women, Big Hair
episodes.overview: Amanda comes to Andrea's rescue when Chris reverts to his old ways. As Bri grapples with a decision that threatens to divide her family, Monie prepares to share some big news with the group.

episodes.name: Reunion, Part 1
episodes.overview: The ladies come together with host Kevin Frazier to recap Season 2. Chris and Jordan stop by to discuss their relationships with the twins, Andrea and Amanda. Meanwhile, Miss Juicy puts Monie in the hot seat when it comes to her pregnancy. Monie’s mom, Tammie, also makes an appearance to let Miss Juicy know EXACTLY how she feels about her.

episodes.name: Reunion, Part 2
episodes.overview: The ladies come together with host Kevin Frazier to recap Season 2. Chris and Jordan stop by to discuss their relationships with the twins, Andrea and Amanda. Meanwhile, Miss Juicy puts Monie in the hot seat when it comes to her pregnancy. Monie’s mom, Tammie, also makes an appearance to let Miss Juicy know EXACTLY how she feels about her.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two dives deeper into relationships and rivalries among this group of “frenemies.” Temperatures rise in the South as the ladies must now face the consequences of their actions following a tumultuous season of fighting, betrayal and deceit. No one is immune from the drama.

episodes.name: Party Foul
episodes.overview: With tensions still high from the reunion, Monie’s good friend Tanya invites her and Juicy over for a party. When Tanya’s new roommate Sam invites the twins and Minnie, their party takes a turn for the worse. Minnie attempts to put the past behind her and reveals a shocking confession to Juicy!

episodes.name: The Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: Minnie’s confession about her pregnancy has the Twins feeling betrayed. Meanwhile Monie’s relationship is put under the magnifying glass once again when her biological dad and brother show up unannounced. Tempers flare when Sam confronts Minnie about her past lies and a newly discovered mug shot!

episodes.name: Masquerade Ballers
episodes.overview: Tanya struggles to work out a custody arrangement with her ex, forcing Sam and Monie to step in to help. With Chris away, Andrea must deal with her daughter Aubrey’s health issues on her own. Meanwhile Monie brings the group to a charity masquerade ball, but the fun doesn’t last when the girls become the focus of attention for all the wrong reasons.

episodes.name: Just a Friend
episodes.overview: Minnie’s living situation takes a turn for the awkward when her mother Tammie asks to move in. And with Andrea ready to get back to work, the twins decide to step away from twerking and embark on new endeavors. When Tanya’s baby daddy visits Atlanta, the group refuses to believe their relationship is strictly platonic, pushing Tanya to her breaking point.

episodes.name: Mama Drama
episodes.overview: After her disastrous dinner party, Tanya turns to Sam for comfort. Juicy invites the girls to the taping of her new television pilot, “Juicy Talk,” and Tanya finally reveals the truth behind her relationship with Nico. Meanwhile Andrea tells Amanda some big news that threatens to divide their family!

episodes.name: Dinner Reservations
episodes.overview: After an explosive fight with her mom and sister, Andrea decides to seek professional help. Juicy invites all the girls to dinner to meet her mom and sister, but Minnie is fearful. When Monie comes clean about losing her engagement ring, Morlin makes a decision that could change their relationship forever.

episodes.name: Pregnant Pause
episodes.overview: With Monie still reeling from her breakup with Morlin, the Tiny Twins meet with their new managers and decide to seek out speech therapy. Minnie arranges for a fun-filled camping trip to cheer up a depressed Monie, but the focus lands on Tanya when she reveals some big news to the girls!

episodes.name: Insignificant Other
episodes.overview: Andrea and Amanda prepare for a visit from their parents, who have some harsh criticism for Andrea. Minnie seeks advice from the girls about her relationship with Gary, only to leave her with more doubt. When Tanya announces that she and Nico are moving in together, Sam makes her true feelings known.

episodes.name: Houston, We Have a Problem
episodes.overview: Monie travels to Houston to visit her son D2, but when she asks her ex-husband if D2 can live with her in Atlanta, Monie doesn’t get the answer she expected. Meanwhile Minnie confronts a scary medical issue and Tanya worries about her future with Nico.

episodes.name: Bad Romance
episodes.overview: When Tanya throws a housewarming party to reintroduce the girls to Nico, things don’t go as expected. Juicy and Minnie hatch a plan to reunite Monie and Morlin, while Amanda gets a surprise when she celebrates her two-year anniversary with Jordan.

episodes.name: Bobbleheads Will Roll
episodes.overview: Amanda finally confronts Jordan about the future of their relationship. To show Morlin how much she cares, Monie throws him a casino themed party before her luck runs out. And when Juicy reveals a surprise new venture, Minnie is quick to throw shade…and chicken!

episodes.name: Spill The Tea
episodes.overview: The girls prepare to celebrate Juicy’s birthday in grand fashion. When Minnie refuses to take responsibility for her recent actions, Juicy makes it clear that Minnie isn’t welcome at her party. Not one to take no for an answer, Minnie crashes the event and Juicy is forced to take extreme measures.

episodes.name: In It to Twin It
episodes.overview: When Sam makes a surprise return to Atlanta, not all the girls are happy to see her. The Tiny Twins set out to host their first party at a popular nightclub, but Tanya’s friend Abira steals the spotlight, resulting in a parking lot throw down.

episodes.name: Not So Little Surprises
episodes.overview: After Tanya drops a bomb on Nico, he finds an unlikely confidante in Ms. Juicy. Meanwhile, the twins must decide if they’ll take the high road following their huge fight with Abira. Tanya’s baby shower takes a turn for the unexpected when her mom confronts Nico.

episodes.name: Escape from Atlanta
episodes.overview: In an attempt to heal her rift with Juicy, Minnie brings the girls together for an Escape Room bonding exercise, but Juicy has other ideas. As news of Nico’s confession spreads through the group, Tanya gears up for a dramatic confrontation with her ex!

episodes.name: Stage Fight
episodes.overview: Ms. Juicy excludes Minnie from an acting workshop, causing a rift between the Twins when they are forced to choose sides. After having her kids tested for dwarfism, Tanya is brought to tears as she struggles to accept the results. Juicy, Monie and Sam take part in a play, but Sam’s stage fright could bring the curtain down on their performance.

episodes.name: Good Deed Gone Bad
episodes.overview: The girls volunteer at a senior center with the Rickey Smiley Foundation, but their good deed turns bad when Minnie goes behind Juicy’s back and asks her boss Rickey for help getting into radio. Meanwhile Tanya’s birth plan hits a roadblock when her doctor expresses concern over her desire to deliver naturally.

episodes.name: Miami Vices
episodes.overview: The Little Women of Atlanta hit the beaches of Miami! When the Tiny Twins’ book a gig in South Beach, they invite all the girls along for some fun in the sun. But the fun doesn’t last long as Juicy and Minnie’s rivalry threatens to ruin everyone’s trip. Andrea struggles with being away from her kids leading her to rethink her future as part of the Tiny Twins.

episodes.name: Cruise Control
episodes.overview: When the girls set out on a cruise to the Bahamas, things go off-course as Amanda continues to doubt Andrea’s commitment to the Tiny Twinz. Tanya and Andrea form an unlikely bond over their similar family situations, and Monie worries there may not be a future for her and Morlin.

episodes.name: Unexpected Ending
episodes.overview: Monie must take matters into her own hands when Morlin refuses to commit to a wedding. Andrea makes a shocking decision that blindsides Amanda and threatens to change their relationship forever. Meanwhile, Tanya attempts to bring Nico and DeVon together with disastrous results.

episodes.name: Season 3 Reunion - Part 1
episodes.overview: The ladies come together with host Terra Jol to recap season three of “Little Women: Atlanta.” Things get heated when Minnie’s mother, Tammie, makes a scene and stirs up conflict with the entire cast. Tanya’s complicated relationships take center stage when both Nico and Devon show up. And Abira returns, pushing “Mama Bear” Minnie to the breaking point as she defends the Tiny Twinz.

episodes.name: Season 3 Reunion - Part 2
episodes.overview: The “Little Women: Atlanta” reunion continues as Minnie and Abira’s conflict boils over, with Tammie adding more fuel to the fire backstage. Once host Terra Jol  gets things back under control, the ladies look back at happier times including their trip to the Bahamas. And finally, we get a sneak peek at Monie’s upcoming wedding specials.

episodes.name: Monie Gets Married: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: Monie and Morlin are finally on the path to marriage, but Monie’s plans for a wedding on a beach in Jamaica are quickly derailed when a family conflict means that her stepfather might not be there to walk her down the aisle.

episodes.name: Monie Gets Married: Runaway Groom
episodes.overview: Monie, Morlin and the whole wedding party hit the Las Vegas strip for a dual bachelor and bachelorette weekend. Later, Juicy plans a night to remember, but when Morlin doesn’t come home after his night out with the boys, Monie’s left questioning whether his heart is still in it.

episodes.name: Monie Gets Married: Best Man Betrayal
episodes.overview: With only one week till the wedding, Monie and Morlin arrive in Houston only to discover that the venue isn’t going to work. Meanwhile, Amanda lets Minnie in on a secret that could change the Tiny Twinz forever. Tensions between Morlin and his best man begin to mount resulting in an explosive showdown.

episodes.name: Monie Gets Married: Wedding Bells and Farewells
episodes.overview: The big day has arrived, but the bridezilla in Monie comes out when the wedding cake is nowhere to be found; Amanda asks Andrea to move back to Atlanta after the wedding, but Andrea has other plans; and Sam warns Minnie not to steal the spotlight on Monie’s special day, but Minnie has her own agenda.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season three returns with Ms. Juicy, Minnie, Monie, Amanda and Andrea, along with new little lady Tanya. As the girls struggle to navigate their relationships, new bonds are formed and old ties are broken. And even though some relationships may be damaged beyond repair, a shocking admission forces all of the girls to confront a new reality.

episodes.name: You're Fired
episodes.overview: Minnie trains for her first 5K run; Amanda has a showdown with the Tiny Twinz's manager, Gayle; new manager Juicy signs her first artist; dangerous complications arise as Tanya prepares to give birth at home.

episodes.name: Skinny Minnie
episodes.overview: Sam steps in when Minnie decides to try a dangerous weight-loss procedure; Amanda lands an apprenticeship at a nail salon, but her first job without her sister is not what she expected; Tanya is reluctant to bring her baby around some of the girls.

episodes.name: Radio Wars
episodes.overview: During Monie's surprise birthday party for Morlin, Minnie announces she has landed a new gig in radio; with another baby on the way, Andrea gives Chris an ultimatum; Tanya is forced to make a difficult decision regarding her other children.

episodes.name: Juicy' Got Talent
episodes.overview: Following a heated argument, Nico finally expresses his true feelings for Tanya; Minnie's health takes a dangerous turn; Sam and the twins learn Caylea from Dallas is performing in Juicy's talent showcase, turning her big night into a big disaster.

episodes.name: Road Trippin'
episodes.overview: Amanda and Jordan convince the group to go on a fishing trip, but Jordan has ulterior motives; Tanya makes a decision regarding Tahirih that impacts the entire group; all hell breaks loose after Minnie finds out Abira has been invited on the trip.

episodes.name: Road Trippin' Part 2
episodes.overview: The drama heats up during the group's fishing trip in Tennessee; Minnie worries she has ruined Jordan's surprise for Amanda; Andrea and Chris fall back into their old ways when Chris' jealousy gets the best of him.

episodes.name: Another Bad Romance
episodes.overview: When Tanya throws a housewarming party to reintroduce the girls to Nico, things don’t go as expected. Juicy and Minnie hatch a plan to reunite Monie and Morlin, while Amanda gets a surprise when she celebrates her two-year anniversary with Jordan.

episodes.name: Cover Girls
episodes.overview: Juicy lands her first magazine cover shoot but takes a risk by hiring Sam to do her makeup; Minnie debates whether to forgive Andrea and attend her baby shower; Monie realizes things might be moving too fast with Morlin.

episodes.name: Girl Power
episodes.overview: Monie and Minnie help Sam overcome her commitment issues; Andrea experiences serious pregnancy complications, putting her and the baby at risk; the girls rally around Juicy after she receives an unexpected health scare.

episodes.name: Big Little Decisions
episodes.overview: Sam helps Devon plan a romantic surprise for Tanya; Juicy sets out to buy her dream home, but Monie thinks she is making a big mistake; Andrea struggles with a decision that could change her life forever.

episodes.name: Ex & the City
episodes.overview: Tanya plans a trip to New York City with some of the girls, but an unannounced guest throws her plans into turmoil; Sam worries about introducing her new boyfriend to the girls and her parents; Andrea is rushed to the hospital.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Back
episodes.overview: After firing their manager, the Twinz are under a deadline to get their career back on track. Juicy meets with Atlanta rap moguls The Street Execs and gets offered a huge opportunity. Monie is devastated by news that could change her and her family’s lives, and the return of familiar faces ushers in a new level of drama.

episodes.name: Diss Means War
episodes.overview: Juicy drops a bomb that makes the Cheeks and Twinz reconsider their shot with Street Execs. The Cheeks uproot their families to Atlanta for a career break, despite the secret Emily is carrying. Meanwhile, Minnie devises a plan to use her podcast to trick Juicy into helping Abira and the Twinz are upset by a song dissing them at an event thrown by the Street Execs.

episodes.name: Put a Ring On It
episodes.overview: Chris shocks Amanda with his plan to propose to Andrea. Emily throws a pregnancy wrench in Juicy’s plans for the Cheeks and the Street Execs. Meanwhile, Minnie lands a legendary hip hop artist to co-host her podcast and things get tense when the Twinz and Abira collaborate on a track.

episodes.name: Show Up and Show Out
episodes.overview: The Cheat Code concert is coming up which will decide who’s going to be the opening act on the Street Execs tour. Juicy and the Cheeks worry that Emily’s pregnancy will knock the Cheeks out of the running so Juicy’s forced to look for back-up. Meanwhile, Minnie sees it as an opportunity get The Twinz and Abira in the door but that doesn’t sit well with Juicy. A lifetime of ear issues threatens Andrea’s ability to record the Twinz track and exacerbate her ongoing problems with new fianc e, Chris.

episodes.name: On the Dotted Line
episodes.overview: With proceeds for album sales and the concert tour on the line, Minnie and Juicy hustle to officially sign their artists but Juicy has a trick up her sleeve. The Twinz bump heads when they realize how difficult it is to plan a double wedding and maintain their music career. Meanwhile, Minnie’s health reaches critical condition and she is forced to make a life changing decision.

episodes.name: Why You Mad Sis?
episodes.overview: Juicy and Minnie are given another challenge to prove their clients have what it takes to land a spot on the Street Execs Tour. Emily’s ego threatens to sabotage the Cheek’s reputation. Monie Love sets Minnie up with a new love interest and Minnie throws down with Juicy over trying to poach her clients.

episodes.name: Collaborate, Not Hate
episodes.overview: After a disastrous meeting at the Street Execs, Juicy and Minnie have their work cut out for themselves to repair their relationship with the record label and keep Abira and Emily from tanking the compilation LP, an opportunity of a lifetime. Meanwhile the friction among the artists leads to an unlikely electric collaboration between Bumpman and Abira. The Twinz push forward planning their double wedding despite Chris being M.I.A. and Minnie reveals intimate details about her health and her love life in her podcast with Monie Love.

episodes.name: Getting Schooled
episodes.overview: With the LP album dead, Minnie needs to develop The Twinz as artists to keep them in the running for the Street Execs tour. She convinces the Twinz to collaborate with an up and coming artist who’s never worked with Little People before, which soon proves the prejudice that they’re up against. Fed up with Emily’s bad attitude, Juicy gives The Cheeks a time out which puts Emily on the offensive.  Abira and Andrea attempt to learn how to manage their anger but it might be too little too late.

episodes.name: Collabing with the Enemy
episodes.overview: After Emily goes behind Bri’s back, Bri makes a drastic move and approaches their long-time arch enemies, the Tiny Twinz, in the hopes of a collaboration. Minnie bravely accepts Odell’s comedy challenge and Emily leaves Atlanta and Bri behind to go back to Texas.

episodes.name: For Better or Worse
episodes.overview: As The Twinz continue to plan their double wedding, Andrea runs into issues with Chris which threatens to tear apart their joint wedding plans. Now with Emily gone from Atlanta, Bri decides to try a solo career behind Emily’s back. Abira and Bumpman decide to take their relationship to the next level.

episodes.name: Maid of Dishonor
episodes.overview: The ATL gang descend upon Dallas for Amanda's wedding. Juicy lands the Cheeks an interview with Salute Magazine, and Bri gets mad when Emily takes all of the attention. Meanwhile, Minnie finds out she's been demoted from Maid of Honor and it threatens to ruin Amanda's bachelorette party.

episodes.name: Crazy, Stupid Love
episodes.overview: Everyone's in Texas for Amanda's wedding... except Chris, who has tried to make amends with Andrea but she's on the fence. All the while, Juicy spills the beans to Emily that Bri has been recording behind her back and causes a rift between them. And Amanda's father questions her marrying Jordan, just before he walks her down the aisle.

episodes.name: Stealing My Shine
episodes.overview: Abira goes ballistic when she thinks Minnie is doing more for the Twinz than for her; Juicy approaches Bri with a great career opportunity, but worries if Bri is Emily's puppet; Andrea receives a big surprise that could ruin her night.

episodes.name: Jealousy Is Not a Good Look
episodes.overview: Juicy continues to build her clientele by scoping out new artists and investors; Andrea wants to leave the music biz to focus on family; Emily tries to convince Bri not to perform solo; Abira pops off at Minnie's birthday party.

episodes.name: The Final Count
episodes.overview: Abira's anger issues toward the Twinz and Minnie's mismanagement puts everyone's performance chances at risk; Bri stands to miss out on a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity after Emily summons her back to Dallas due to pregnancy complications.

episodes.name: Burying the Hatchet With Ms. Ratchet
episodes.overview: Abira's drunken outburst at the Final Cut causes friction; Emily gives birth to her son in an emergency cesarean section; the Street Execs' decision on who will be the opening act on their upcoming tour leaves everyone stunned.

episodes.name: No Respect For The Queen
episodes.overview: Monie makes her return to Atlanta looking for support and a place to stay; the long- standing feud between Abira and the Twinz erupts.

episodes.name: Minnie's Got A Man
episodes.overview: Monie struggles to make sense of her crumbling marriage; Amanda deals with a health issue; the Twinz and Abira continue to battle it out; tensions run high when Minnie introduces her new man to the group.

episodes.name: Spiritual Smackdown
episodes.overview: As Amanda takes control of her music career, Minnie’s management skills come into question; Tanya makes a surprise return to Atlanta to celebrate Abira’s birthday and attempt to bring the fractured group together through some spiritual healing.

episodes.name: Miss Management
episodes.overview: After the showdown with the Twinz, Abira gains some perspective on how being little has affected her; the Twinz put Minnie on notice; Andrea attempts to walk the runway; Juicy insults the rest of the girls when a St. Patrick’s Day gig goes awry.

episodes.name: A Life Worth Celebrating
episodes.overview: After losing their sister Minnie in a tragic accident, the ladies of Atlanta come together to honor and celebrate her life; as the girls mourn their beloved friend, the reality of Minnie’s loss proves too much to bear for some.

episodes.name: Little Women, Big Voices
episodes.overview: Abira shows up tipsy to a self-defense class; Monie is undermined by Morlin; Amanda gets life changing news; Juicy hosts a rally against racial injustice.

episodes.name: All The Rage
episodes.overview: A relaxing day on the lake turns tense when Ms. Juicy surprises the girls with a new friend; Andrea encounters tough competition as she struggles to impress at her first modeling audition; at a rage room, Juicy’s friend pushes Monie too far.

episodes.name: Don't Give Up On Me
episodes.overview: Andrea faces the harsh reality of trying to model as a little person in an average size industry.

episodes.name: Model Mayhem
episodes.overview: Juicy hires a celebrity photographer and invites all of the girls to do an alter ego photoshoot; being new in the group, Juicy tells Temera that she won’t be included in the photo shoot, leaving her feeling left out.

episodes.name: Music City Meltdown
episodes.overview: When Amanda is invited by a prominent music manager to Nashville, she invites the gang to go with her.

episodes.name: Stop Horsing Around
episodes.overview: Monie’s attempt to make a career connection makes her the butt of Ms. Juicy’s jokes, and Monie’s revenge gag goes one step too far. Meanwhile, the Twins plan to visit Minnie’s grave on the way back from Nashville, with or without the rest of the girls, while Tamera makes a big decision about her future in Atlanta.
